api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: Jira API Token. See the docs for more information on how to generate this key.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The Domain for your Jira account, e.g. airbyteio.atlassian.net

email.title: Email
email.description: The user email for your Jira account.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: List of Jira project keys to replicate data for.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you want to replicate data from Jira, use the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. Note that this field only applies to certain streams, and only data generated on or after the start date will be replicated. For more information, refer to the documentation.

expand_issue_changelog.title: Expand Issue Changelog
expand_issue_changelog.description: Expand the changelog when replicating issues.

render_fields.title: Render Issue Fields
render_fields.description: Render issue fields in HTML format in addition to Jira JSON-like format.

enable_experimental_streams.title: Enable Experimental Streams
enable_experimental_streams.description: Allow the use of experimental streams which rely on undocumented Jira API endpoints. See https://docs.airbyte.com/integrations/sources/jira#experimental-tables for more info.
